import React, { Component, useState } from 'react'; import MainLogo from '../img/Mainlogo.png'; import { ChevronRightIcon, StarIcon, CheckCircleIcon} from '@heroicons/react/solid' import { KeyIcon, PuzzleIcon, MoonIcon, IdentificationIcon, AnnotationIcon, GlobeAltIcon, LightningBoltIcon, MailIcon, ScaleIcon } from '@heroicons/react/outline' import { supabase } from '../supabaseClient' import { Link, animateScroll as scroll } from "react-scroll"; // import Toggle from '../components/Toggle'; const transferFeatures = [ { id: 1, name: 'Influencers for everyone', description: 'Whether you’re looking for a fashionista, an anime fanatic, or a comedic personality, we’ve got a variety of creators for all brands.', icon: GlobeAltIcon, }, { id: 2, name: 'Secure and scam-proof', description: 'We know the value of your products - that’s why we make sure that your clothing gets shown off using deadlines and agreements, and we also promise your money back in case anything goes wrong.', icon: KeyIcon, }, { id: 3, name: 'Peace of mind', description: 'After a project gets approved, everything gets put into cruise control! We make it easy and secure for information to be shared and the final product to come out to your liking.', icon: MoonIcon, }, ] const communicationFeatures = [ { id: 1, name: 'Tailored to you', description: 'You can accept projects at your own schedule and get reminders of requests straight to your email inbox!', icon: IdentificationIcon, }, { id: 2, name: 'Flexible and easy', description: 'With deadlines of up to a month and easy-to-make videos, you can manage all of your projects effortlessly, all while diversifying your wardrobe and making money!', icon: PuzzleIcon, }, ] const people = [ { name: 'Huda Noor', role: '910k', imageUrl: 'https://p16-sign-va.tiktokcdn.com/tos-maliva-avt-0068/7918f9a3f351b9b2257053397d255fb9~c5_720x720.jpeg?x-expires=1630252800&x-signature=ItVK%2BSo4ShB0N4Ppx2pyYMJ0wlw%3D', }, { name: 'Avalon Warren', role: '390k', imageUrl: 'https://p16-sign-va.tiktokcdn.com/musically-maliva-obj/1663125240637445~c5_720x720.jpeg?x-expires=1630256400&x-signature=f%2BxaCWVgo%2FobplOQ0%2Bwy8wqzfb8%3D' }, { name: role: '370k', imageUrl: 'https://p16-sign-va.tiktokcdn.com/tos-maliva-avt-0068/47515f1449c6aa4041ac7ccd88875ab9~c5_720x720.jpeg?x-expires=1630256400&x-signature=k0a2SGWrxEqYseexzxXahghrzow%3D' }, { name: 'Chy', role: '930k', imageUrl: 'And Many More..', imageUrl: 'https://i.ibb.co/yNyjGFt/tiktoklogo.png' }, // More people... ] const Landing = () => (
{/* */}
); function Hero() { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [success, setSuccess] = useState(false); async function addEmail({ email }) { try { setLoading(true) let { data } = await supabase.from('email_list').select('email').eq('email', `${email}`) if (!data.length > 0) { const info = { email, added_at: new Date(), } let { error } = await supabase.from('email_list').insert(info, { returning: 'minimal', }) if (error) { throw error } } } catch (error) { console.log(error.message) } finally { setTimeout(() => { setLoading(false) }, 2000); setTimeout(() => { setSuccess(true); setEmail('') }, 2000); } } return (
{/*
What's new Just shipped version 0.1.0
*/}

The Future of

Influencer Marketing

Announcr connects clothing brands with influencers to create subtle advertisements. Better engagement, results, and convenience – all for a cheaper price.

{/* Remove this to get rid of the toggle */} {/* */} setEmail(e.target.value)} />

} {/*
Rated 5 stars by{' '} all our beta users

) } function FeatureSectionOne() { return (

Advertising without ads

With Announcr, influencers can promote a brand’s clothing without changing their content. Gone are the days of sponsored posts with low engagement and retention rates!

For brands

Brands can browse through our catalog of influencers and request the perfect fit. After everything gets set up, we make the process seamless using our project interface.

{transferFeatures.map((item) => (

{item.name}

{item.description}
))}

For influencers

As an influencer, you receive exclusive and innovative clothing for TikToks, all without the burden of making an ad or changing your content!

{communicationFeatures.map((item) => (

{item.name}

{item.description}
))}
) } function TrustedBy() { return (

Used by clothing brands around the world

We've worked with brands anywhere from Europe to Australia to the USA. Join our beta group and get early access to influencers – we aren't taking a commission.

Get Early Access
{/*
*/}
) } function MeetInfluencers() { return (

Meet The Influencers

Here are some of the influencers on our platform. If you are one, and would like to join, email us here.

    {people.map((person) => (

  • {person.name}

    {person.role}

    • ))}
) } function CTA() { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [success, setSuccess] = useState(false); async function addEmail({ email }) { try { setLoading(true) let { data } = await supabase.from('email_list').select('email').eq('email', `${email}`) if (!data.length > 0) { const info = { email, added_at: new Date(), } let { error } = await supabase.from('email_list').insert(info, { returning: 'minimal', }) if (error) { throw error } } } catch (error) { console.log(error.message) } finally { setTimeout(() => { setLoading(false) }, 2000); setTimeout(() => { setSuccess(true); setEmail('') }, 2000); } } return (

Get notified when we’re launching.

We are building our network of creators and brands, and plan to launch late 2021. Join our email list for early access.

setEmail(e.target.value)} />
) } export default Landing;
